meta.description: "One of the specific ways that the Genius Bar works is by appointment. Apple customers are encouraged to make appointments before visiting the store in order to get quick and personalized service. In some cases, this practice has become controversial for customers who would prefer to get walk-in repair service. Nevertheless, the Genius Bar service is generally part of Apple�s reputation for superior customer service and its dominant position in the consumer hardware market. Customers compare their visit to the Genius bar to their visit to the doctor" -

images.title: Refining the sands in order to get the best quality of the iron ore
Refining the sands in order to get the best quality of the iron ore
A plate of nickel between two plates of iron. The plates were resulted from the heatened ores.
Forging work (the shaping of the metal into a kris) done after the three plates unites into a single plate of metal through another forging work. The plate is called saton.

meta.description:
OLIO connects neighbours with each other and with local shops so surplus food and other items can be shared, not thrown away.
If you love food, hate waste, care about the environment or want to connect with your community, OLIO is for you.

meta.description: PVOH (Polyvinyl alcohol) is a synthetic polymer that degrades when is in contact with water and do not contaminate. It has no odor and is not toxic, and is resistant to grease, oils, and solvents. It is ductile but strong, flexible, and functions as a high oxygen and aroma barrier. It can be used to do plastic bags or other packagings.

meta.description: polyhydroxyalkanoates (PHA) are polyesters produced in nature by numerous microorganisms, including through bacterial fermentation of sugar or lipids. PHA have active properties and act as a passive barrier to reduce food waste by prolonging food shelf life. PHA can be produced using food industry by-products, such as cheese whey and almond shells, which assure the biodegradability and recyclability, and reduce food waste.

meta.description: A2 milk is cow's milk that mostly lacks a form of ?-casein proteins called A1 and instead has mostly the A2 form which many believe causes the same gut problems as lactose intolerance. The australian A2 Milk Company claims that this milk is a result of breeding, not GMOs, brough this product to the market and has 10% of milk market share in Australia.
